In addition, it has a basement, a central distributor and a garage with capacity for five cars or more with direct access from the street. The property has 350 m² built and 300 m² useful, 3 bedrooms (although you can expand to five if you want), 3 bathrooms, built-in wardrobes, storage room and a south orientation that allows a large amount of natural light.
